title: Fontbase Update
content:
An update for DTP Types Fontbase for Windows is now available for registered users.  
You can down load the update from:  
 [http://www.dtptypes.com/software/fontbase.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824111211/http:/www.dtptypes.com/software/fontbase.html "http://www.dtptypes.com/software/fontbase.html")

thanks
author: malcolm
